What it is: Reveals where you've emotionally withdrawn to avoid conflict or overload.
How to use it: Describe an interaction where you felt numb or absent. Ask AI to locate the moment of withdrawal and its root cause.

What it is: Audits the language you use in your internal voice for embedded negativity or distortion.
How to use it: Transcribe a typical inner monologue. Ask AI to highlight harmful language patterns and suggest alternatives.
What it changes: Reprograms self-talk into clarity and compassion.

What it is: Creates a symbolic figure or ritual that authorizes your next phase or choice.
How to use it: Describe a decision youâ€™re hesitating on. Ask AI to construct a symbolic grantor (e.g. mythical being, elder, future self) that confers permission.

What it is: Identifies beliefs, fears, or coping strategies passed down from previous generations.
How to use it: Describe a life struggle. Ask AI what inherited belief it echoes and how to return or revise it.

What it is: Strengthens your symbolic threshold for holding contradiction, pain, or ambiguity.
How to use it: Describe a dilemma. Ask AI to simulate a symbolic stretch (e.g. carrying paradox, holding fire and water) to expand tolerance.
What it changes: Builds narrative resilience and integrative power.

What it is: Separates your identity from entangled relational roles or dynamics.
How to use it: Describe an overly enmeshed relationship. Ask AI to design a ritual for healthy detachment.

What it is: Identifies and deactivates the internalized gaze you perform under.
How to use it: Describe a context where you feel watched or judged. Ask AI to name the internalized gaze and simulate freedom from it.

What it is: Converts core fears into the underlying unmet needs.
How to use it: Name a fear. Ask AI to reveal what unfulfilled desire or safety need it masks.

What it is: Guides you back to a forgotten or exiled part of your psyche.
How to use it: Describe a long-abandoned desire or quality. Ask AI to create a symbolic return path to it.

What it is: Translates shame into its symbolic message and unmet emotional context.
How to use it: Describe a shame memory. Ask AI to extract the symbolic need or message buried inside.
What it changes: Decodes shame into repair and recovery.
